CustomField.formula: IMAGE("https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=" + BillingStreet + "," + BillingCity + "," + BillingCountry + "&zoom=16&size=600x300&markers=color:red|" + BillingStreet + "," + BillingCity + "," + BillingCountry + "&sensor=false" , "No map available", 300, 600)
CustomField.label: map image
